attributes.action: Allow indefinite leave to remain (ILR) holders to get citizenship.
attributes.additional_details: This is in regards to denying illegal entrants citizenship. Please consider those with ILR with family and are contributing to the UK.
attributes.background: To allow citizenship applicants with ILR to get citizenship

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Reverse guidance stopping refugees gaining citizenship
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717817
